data.title: Countries that use the Yemeni rial
data.meta_description: Usage and exchange rates of the Yemeni rial. Convert YER to any other currency.
data.text:
Exchange rate history 1000 YER in USD

The graph shown here shows the exchange rate development from January 2018 to March 2024. The exchange rate for 1000 YER moved during this time from USD 4.00 to USD 3.99. In these 74 months it fell by 0.3 percent.

Sources

All conversion rates are based on data from the European Central Bank.

Data on currency and gold reserves are from the International Monetary Fund.
